title: Zindagi kse bdlti h
content:
Zindagi kse bdlti h

Jin Hathon m Kl tk thi kalam 

Aaj un Hathon m h churiyan 

kandhe p Kl tk tha basta

Aaj h parivar ki zimmedari 

Kl tk Jo Maa Bap ki thi ladli 

Aaj ho gyi h sasural m akeli

Kl tk Hr farmayishen hoti thi puri

Aaj wo ander hi ander dab k reh jati h

Kl tk Jo Maa K Hathon ka hi khati thi

Aaj wo bnati h Sbke k liye khana

Kl tk Maa Baap sehte the Uske nakhre 

Aaj wo sehti h sasural walon k nakhre

Dost zindagi ase ho badalti h jb ladkiyan parayi ho jati h

 

Kl tk thi Jo Maa Bap k aankhon ka tara 

Aaj Sch m sitara ho chli

sb Kuch kurban krke jise pdhaya tha Maa Bap NE 

Aaj wo Khud kurban ho chli 

kitne sapne sanjoye the un aankhon ne 

Jo Ab is duniya ki wjah se bnd ho chli 

na socha un logo ne asa krne se Phle kse Uske aabru ko tar tar kr diya

jis Raste p Kl tk thi wo chlti 

Aaj unhi raston p Usne apni ijjat ki bheek thi mangi

par na in logo ne suna or na hi Koi masiha tha aaya

dheere dheere chad rii thi uske armano ki bali

or Kuch hi Der m Vida ho chuki thi wo kali

 

Courtesy: Surbhi Sneha

recommendations.title: Kse Hmari zindagi se Koi chla jata h
recommendations.content:
Kse Hmari zindagi se Koi chla jata h

na chahte hue bhi Hme chor jata h

Bs m na rhta Uske Kuch 

na hi hmare Bs m rhta kuch

recommendations.title: Zindagi kse bdlti h
